original: @194a # // rgya gar skad du /

original: 'phags ma rigs byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma rigs byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: gang gis dran pa tsam gyis ni //

original: dang po re zhig sngags pas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bud med kyi tshogs la sogs pa dang bral bar stan bde ba la 'dug ste /

analyzed: rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig dang po yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'od zer dang bcas pa'i hr'i:yig gi sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs kyis 'gro ba rnams gsal bar mdzad pa sngon du 'gro bas ku ru
translated: In one‚Äôs heart, the first vowel [a] completely transforms into a moon mandala, upon which is a seed syllable hrƒ´·∏•, from which emanate light rays and a collection of red light rays that illuminate migrating beings.

original: kulle'i ri la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma rigs byad ma yang dag par bskul nas spyan drangs shing mdun gyi nam mkha' la yang dag par bsams te /
analyzed: kulle'i ri la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma rigs byad ma yang dag par bskul nas spyan drangs shing mdun gyi nam mkha' la yang dag par bsams te /

analyzed: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las sprul pa'i me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i @194b mchod pas mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should make offerings with various offerings of flowers, incense, and so on emanated from the light rays of the seed syllable in the heart.

original: de'i rjes la phyag 'tshal ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: de'i rjes la phyag 'tshal ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: After that, one should perform the prostrations, confess the sins, rejoice in the merits, dedicate the merits, go for refuge to the Three Jewels, and generate the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to the Three Jewels.

original: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //

original: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //

original: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //

original: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //

analyzed: de nas tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: Then, having gone for refuge to the Three Jewels, one should meditate on the four immeasurables.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom zhing /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom zhing /
translated: Then, one should meditate on all phenomena as emptiness,

original: sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: and one should recite the consecration mantra.

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /

analyzed: de'i rjes la 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba mtha' dag la snying rje bas /
translated: After that, one should generate compassion for all suffering beings.

original: rang gi sems kyi sa bon gyi gzugs la blta ste /

translated: One should look at the form that is the seed of one‚Äôs mind.

original: de yongs su gyur pa la autpa la dmar po'i steng na dbyangs yig dang po yongs su gyur pa las zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis sngon bzhin du 'gro ba rnams gsal bar mdzad nas /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa la autpa la dmar po'i steng na dbyangs yig dang po yongs su gyur pa las zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis sngon bzhin du 'gro ba rnams gsal bar mdzad nas /
translated: That completely transforms into a red lotus, upon which is the first vowel [a], which completely transforms into a moon, upon which is the seed syllable.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba mtha' yas pa yang dag par bskul zhing spyan drangs nas mdun du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba mtha' yas pa yang dag par bskul zhing spyan drangs nas mdun du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should visualize that the light rays from the seed syllable illuminate the world as before, inviting and summoning limitless millions of tathƒÅgatas.

analyzed: de nas autpa la la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog dmar mo /
translated: Then, from the complete transformation of the lotus and so on, one‚Äôs mind becomes red Vajra Speech, with one face and two arms.

original: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
analyzed: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /

original: ku ru kulle'i ri'i phug na bzhugs pa /

original: sgra gcan zin gyi mgo la gnas pa'i 'dod lha chung ma dang bcas pa'i steng du bzhugs pa /
analyzed: sgra gcan zin gyi mgo la gnas pa'i 'dod lha chung ma dang bcas pa'i steng du bzhugs pa /

translated: He is to be contemplated as sporting with a graceful demeanor, endowed with the prime of youth, and as a celestial maiden.

original: gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Thus, having generated the pledge being, one should invite the awareness being in front in a moment, and having made perfect offerings, one should cause it to enter inside the mouth with the pledge seal.

original: de ltar bsgoms nas bzlas pa bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar bsgoms nas bzlas pa bya ste /

analyzed: ha cang skyen min bul ba'ang min //

analyzed: yang dag ma yin rtog pa spangs /

original: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:h'um sv'a h'a /

original: de ltar thun mtshams gsum gyi rim pas khur ba dang ka ra la sogs pa'i gtor ma dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas rtag tu rgyun ma chad par brtan par 'jug pas zla ba drug tu bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar thun mtshams gsum gyi rim pas khur ba dang ka ra la sogs pa'i gtor ma dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas rtag tu rgyun ma chad par brtan par 'jug pas zla ba drug tu bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Thus, in the sequence of three sessions, having first offered the bali of molasses, sugar, and so forth, one should meditate for six months, always entering firmly without interruption.

original: grub pa'i mtshan ma rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtshan ma rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The signs of accomplishment will arise.

analyzed: de'i rjes la zla ba dang po la nad la sogs pa bar du gcod pa brgya 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: After that, in the first month, one hundred obstacles such as illness will arise.

original: zla ba gnyis pa la ston mo gya nom pa ma bslangs par rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis pa la ston mo gya nom pa ma bslangs par rnyed par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gsum pa la gos sna tshogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma bsgoms na phal cher bud med rnams kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does not practice the Bhagavatƒ´, one will mostly live with women.

original: de la bdud kyi las 'di rnams spangs te /

original: bcom ldan 'das ma sgom par @195b byed pa la rmi lam mam dngos su ston par 'gyur ro //

original: ral gri dang / mig sman dang / rkang pa'i byug pa dang / mi snang ba dang / bcud len dang / mkha' la spyod pa dang / sa la spyod pa dang / sa 'og gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: ral gri dang / mig sman dang / rkang pa'i byug pa dang / mi snang ba dang / bcud len dang / mkha' la spyod pa dang / sa la spyod pa dang / sa 'og gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o //

analyzed: gal te so sor bkas ston par ma gyur na /

original: de'i tshe sngar gsungs pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchod pa dang / gtor ma dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas zla ba drug gi mthar zla ba yongs su gang ba'i mtshan mo ril por bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe sngar gsungs pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchod pa dang / gtor ma dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas zla ba drug gi mthar zla ba yongs su gang ba'i mtshan mo ril por bzlas par bya'o //

analyzed: de nas phyag rgya 'bar te 'grub par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: phyag rgya des tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / nye ba'i dbang po dang / drag po dang / sred med kyi bu la sogs pa yang dag par bkug ste /
